model.name: Monogram Neon Check Oversized Business Shirt
model.disambiguatingDescription: Tailored in a slightly loose fit, this shirt is all about the season’s Neon Check motif. Incorporating an all-over Monogram design, the pattern adorns the piece’s technical cotton fabric. Tonal metallic buttons and a pointy collar complete the look.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 75% Polyester, 25% Cotton
  • Multicolor
  • Slightly Loose Fit
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 32’’ / 81 cm, height 6'2’’ / 188 cm
  • Made in France
